Amaz said, "Gentlemen and Nadia, I have an idea - a $200,000 Hearthstone team league." Hosty spoke up timorously, "But we don't have $200k, how will we pay?" Amaz laughed, "We will win our tournament and never pay a dime!" Hosty cried, "That's a scam!" Amaz backhanded him and said, "You're fired." In the dark, Xixo began to sweat.
